short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A text editor for ChromeOS and Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
InstaEdit is a "Chrome" and "Chrome OS" text editor / code editor.  

This program runs completely offline and doesn't require a internet connection for the program to work.

There are some fun themes you can use while creating your drafts.  More themes will be coming soon.

Features:
Offline
FullScreen
Tab to spaces
Tab size
Wrap lines
Line numbers
Smart Indent
Themes
Font Size
Search

*We do not store your data this app saves to your desktop or local file system.  Also, this app does not use cloud data currently for saving files.
